title: Launched avionmedia.no
description: AvionMedia is a company that builds online stores and websites for both Small, Medium and Large companies.

title: Started my first business.
description: In August 2021, I started my first business. This was a company that printed '' Custom Phone Covers ''. That business went very well, but I felt that it was not for me, and I no longer enjoyed producing covers.

title: My first line of code..
description: I have always been fascinated by technology. And, I've been good at data for a long time. I think I realized the interest in 2nd grade. In March 2020, when korona broke out in Norway, I came across a ''Tutorial'' on how to make a ''Covid Tracker with API'', it was the first time I used an IDE and wrote code.

title: New computer!

title: Start Primary School
description: I began at Primary School in 2015 :)

title: Hello World!
description: I was born the 2th of February 2009
